main event: The sighting occurred in National City, California on May 13th, 1952, where an unidentified flying object emitting a red trail was observed.
interesting points: The object was described as having a white color with oscillating motion and emitted a red trail.
The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds as the object moved rapidly in a horizontal direction at a high rate of speed.
Two witnesses, Mr. and Mrs. William R. McGrew, reported the object crossing the sky at a high rate of speed and disappearing over the horizon without any sound being heard.
The witnesses included an aeronautical engineer, and reports included photographs of the unidentified object sighted on multiple dates in 1952.

One witness, an Air Force veteran, described an encounter with an elongated oval object moving at a tremendous rate of speed, and concluded that it was a vehicle from another planet under the control of intelligent beings.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting a red trail
witnesses: multiple witnesses including an aeronautical engineer, Air Force veteran, and Mr. and Mrs. William R. McGrew
